contentList.content:
Gentle Lady of the Forest, Mielikki, Guardian of Wild Places,
Blessed are the leaves that rustle in your sacred breeze,
Guide us through the shadows of the ancient trees.

Keeper of the Woodlands, watchful and wise,
Grant us the strength to protect nature's prize.
As the moonlight bathes the forest floor,
Illuminate our path with your wisdom evermore.

In the embrace of your serene realm,
We pledge to honor and protect, steadfast at the helm.
Grant us harmony with flora and fauna, great and small,
Mielikki, we humbly heed your timeless call.

May the song of the wilderness be our guide,
And may your presence ever by our side.
Blessed Mielikki, Lady of the Grove,
In your grace, we find solace and love.

As we tread upon the sacred ground,
May our actions echo the harmonious sound.
Honor to you, Mielikki, in whispers we pray,
Guide us through the forest, both night and day.

More poetic prayers are penned, along with a small sketch of a unicorn in the margins.

Majestic Bahamut, Platinum Dragon of Radiant Light,
In the shadow of your wings, I find strength and might.
With scales of noble silver and eyes that gleam,
I stand before you, a dragonborn in your esteemed dream.


Oh, Righteous One, embodiment of justice so pure,
Guide me through challenges, make my purpose sure.
Grant me the courage to face darkness with grace,
In your name, I find solace, in your wings, embrace.


May my breath echo your righteous flame,
As I invoke your name, Bahamut, I proclaim.
Protector of the weak, guardian of the just,
In your presence, I place my unwavering trust.


Platinum Dragon, hear this plea,
Guide me, Bahamut, in your noble decree.
In your radiant light, may my path be clear,
Forever bound to you, without a trace of fear.


Amen, oh Bahamut, in your glory divine,
In your name, this humble dragonborn shall shine.

There is a smudge of chromatic ink at the edge of the page.

Luminous Corellon Larethian, Coronal of Arvandor,
In your radiance, we discover a realm without dictate.
From the loom of creation, we arise,
Children of beauty, breaking earthly ties.

Preserver of Life, shaping form and light,
Bestow upon us wisdom, guide us through the night.
Beneath the moon's celestial art,
May our spirits transcend, free and unbound from the start.

Bearer of the Silver Sword, guardian of elven might,
Grant us strength and courage against the Spider Queen's spite.
In the fluidity of form, beyond binaries we find,
A spectrum of truth, in your design entwined
.

Corellon, whose essence transcends bounds,
In your presence, acceptance resounds.
Guide us through realms, both near and far,
In life's dance, beneath your eternal star.

A small child's drawing of an elf is scratched on the corner of this prayer sheet.
